channel.title: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?
channel.description: I cant figure it out, it says something like, "Made with CDW's Program" above the commands

item.title: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Listen to him ^^^^ Lol I didn’t feel like taking the time to explain, sry. But he explained it well enough for anyone to understand. I hope anyone can understand that…

item.title: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?
item.dc:creator: @Exist2inspire Exist2inspire
item.description:
@Exist2inspire wrote:

heres an example (to be added with the rest of your commands in client.JAVA):

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycommand") && playerRights >= 2)
         {
     addItem(1234, 1);
{

to explain it:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycommand") && playerRights >= 2)

this means that if the player’s rights = 2 (an admin) then do the following:

     addItem(1234, 1);

which will add the item 1234 to the players inventory.

feel free to edit it.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?

item.title: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Ok say u wanted to make a command that gave u 100k well just put
This:

[code]}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“money”) && playerRights >= 1)
{
addItem(995, 100000);
sendMessage(“use this money wisely”);
}[/code]

under:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gang") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(4745, 1); addItem(4712, 1); addItem(4714, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(6524, 1); addItem(6570, 1); addItem(6585, 1); addItem(7462, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(6735, 1); sendMessage("Gangsta!!!!");

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?

item.title: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?
item.dc:creator: @Uber_Newb Uber Newb
item.description:
@Uber_Newb wrote:

the thing is is that they are listed twice like this

First Time"

//Made using CDW's Program public void Commands2()//Start Of Commands2 { sendQuest("@dre@Commands2", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("::splitbark", 8147); sendQuest("::dweaps", 8148); sendQuest("::zammy", 8149); sendQuest("::sara", 8150); sendQuest("::guthix", 8151); sendQuest("::pker", 8152); sendQuest("::melee", 8153); sendQuest("::pots", 8154); sendQuest("::pureeq", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("@blu@Tele/Mini-Game/Places Commands", 8158); sendQuest("::kqueen", 8159); sendQuest("::kbdcave", 8160); sendQuest("::torso", 8161); sendQuest("::pocketportal", 8162); sendQuest("::range", 8163); sendQuest("", 8164); sendQuest("@blu@Mods Commands", 8165); sendQuest("::modlook", 8166); sendQuest("::pk", 8167); sendQuest("::cwarmor", 8168); sendQuest("@blu@Admin Commands", 8169); sendQuest("::sweet", 8170); sendQuest("::banuser (username)", 8171); sendQuest("::xrichie", 8172); sendQuest("::ring", 8173); sendQuest("::alltome", 8174); sendQuest("::vent (text)", 8175); sendQuest("::gang", 8176); sendQuest("::ownage", 8177); sendQuest("::dbones", 8178); sendQuest("::rares", 8179); sendQuest("::update <time>", 8180); sendQuest("::pure", 8181); sendQuest("::master", 8181); sendQuest("::balla", 8181); sendQuest("Owner Commands", 8182); sendQuest("::holyforce", 8183); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

2nd Time:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“sweet”) && playerRights >= 2) {
addItem(775, 1);
addItem(1837, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(1052, 1);
addItem(1704, 1);
addItem(4712, 1);
addItem(4714, 1);
addItem(4708, 1);
addItem(6524, 1);
addItem(385, 19);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rares”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(1040, 1);
addItem(1042, 1);
addItem(1044, 1);
addItem(1046, 1);
addItem(1048, 1);
addItem(1050, 1);
addItem(1053, 1);
addItem(1055, 1);
addItem(1057, 19);
sendMessage(“Here Have Some Rares”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“gang”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4745, 1);
addItem(4712, 1);
addItem(4714, 1);
addItem(4151, 1);
addItem(6524, 1);
addItem(6570, 1);
addItem(6585, 1);
addItem(7462, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(6735, 1);
sendMessage(“Gangsta!!!”);[/code]

I can do the second part, but i dont know what to do in the first part

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?

item.title: How do you make commands on Ricscape v3?
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

That just means he used a command maker…You dont need to. Just simply do ctr + f and search for custom commands and add the command under there. Or just find commands that came with it, and add ur command under it, just use the same format they are in.

Read full topic
